Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' — 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'
MemoryInfobox.location: Archive of Hebe, Oikos of Atlantis, Atlantis

General_Description: '''Tossed for Tyche''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Like so many coins, I was tossed into a fountain for good fortune. Finding me will be fun. It's not every day you get to dance with the [[Bottlenose dolphin|dolphins]] of [[Atlantis]].''
Section_Trivia: *The name of this memory references [[Tyche]], Greek goddess of chance, luck and fate.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
